data.title: JALLIKATTU
data.meta_description:
JALLIKATTU - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. The document discusses the cultural tradition of Jallikattu in Tamil Nadu, India, which involves grabbing onto the back of a bull. 

2. It provides background on legal issues regarding banning the practice, including bans in 2006 for cruelty concerns, regulations in 2009, and a permanent ban in 2014 upheld by the Supreme Court.

3. Large protests erupted in 2017 by Tamils seeing the ban as an attack on their cultural identity and heritage. The governor then passed an ordinance allowing the practice to continue.
